message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90. It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. I'd like to propose a counteroffer of $85 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $92. It's a premium product, and I believe it's worth every penny. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though - I can do $88. What do you think?
